name: Magic Gravity (itch)
description:
Hardcore puzzle platformer about mage in a dungeon with specificult disorientation gameplay. 

Tight jumps, long gaps, quick reaction moments, different trap and logical tasks with gravity.

Features:
- Gravity and disorientation.
- 30 levels.
- 4 bosses.
- 20+ traps.
- 13 hats.
- Direct connect multiplayer.
